node.html: YourTurn enables everyone to stay connected during the Corona crisis. In our app, people can create a challenge, invite their friends, find challenges in their neighborhood, and win prizes.
Data Pipeline enriching the US I94 immigration data with further data such as US airport data, US demographics and temperature data to have a wider basis for analysis on the immigration data.
Visualize the corona-outbreak in our area, region or country and simulate its spread in the nearest futures. Help COVID19 crisis teams identify future shortages such as ICUs & remedial actions.
A platform to connect people seeking help with volunteers duing pandemic time.
A platform combined with a sensor box to obtain and visualize farming data in real-time from fields and to recommend farmers potential actions to take.
A search engine that autonomously crawls documents from a given domain including their subdomains, analyzes them and renders them into a search frontend.
